Articles.Content:
Hi, I have started playing ksp on the PS4 two days ago, and it wasn't as buggy as I thought, anyway, I am having crashes on recovery, it doesn't do it in career, and not in sandbox with vehicles launched from the SPH but when recovering mk1 pods. 

Edited November 15, 2016 by DunaManiac

In my own experience on PS4 crashes and corrupted saves come down to one thing - having unlocked too far into the tech tree in science mode.  I don't have any issues with recovery causing crashes, just like I rarely have issues with crashes at all... until I unlock too far into the tech tree. 

Edited November 18, 2016 by Justin_Kerbal
*science mode, not career

23 hours ago, Justin_Kerbal said:

In my own experience on PS4 crashes and corrupted saves come down to one thing - having unlocked too far into the tech tree in science mode.  I don't have any issues with recovery causing crashes, just like I rarely have issues with crashes at all... until I unlock too far into the tech tree. 

Justin, one thing, this isn't in career mode

51 minutes ago, KerbalXcer said:

Justin, one thing, this isn't in career mode

Gotcha.  For sandbox mode what stops crashing?  Not playing..

If I play sandbox I'm almost guaranteed a crash and save corrupt before touching anything outside of Kerbin.

4 minutes ago, Justin_Kerbal said:

Gotcha.  For sandbox mode what stops crashing?  Not playing..

If I play sandbox I'm almost guaranteed a crash and save corrupt before touching anything outside of Kerbin.

For me, I have already sent probes to the mun, and a save corruption is nowhere in sight.
Scientific breakthrough: so that's why people play career mode and not sandbox!!
